headline: US Oil Drillers Continue to Back Off As Prices Sink
summary: The total number of active drilling rigs for oil and gas in the United States fell this week, according to new data that Baker Hughes published on Friday.

headline: Baker Hughes: A Bet On Data Centers, Energy Infrastructure, And LNG
summary: Baker Hughes valuation appears stretched, with limited margin of safety and average profitability compared to peers. Learn more about BKR stock here.
